si.title: දිවයිනේ දිලිපීට පූජා පන්දම උපහාර
body_lines: දිලෙපන් දිලේපන්ගේ 37 වන අනුස්මරණ සංස්ථා උත්සවය බදාදා (25) සවස යාපනය දූපත් වලදී පැවැත්විණි.
යාපනය වේලානායි අනුස්මරණ ප්රකාශකයා වන මෝටර් රථය ආරම්භ කරන ලදී

en.title: The sacrificial torch tributes to Diliphan in the island
body_lines: Dileepan Dileepan's 37th Memorial Corporation event was held on Wednesday (25) evening in the Jaffna Islands.
The car, which was started at the Jaffna Velanai Memorial Publisher

summary_lines: Here's a summary of the text in approximately 200 characters:
"Dilshan Dileepan's 37th memorial event took place on Wednesday evening in Jaffna Island. A car tribute was organized at the Jaffna Velanai Memorial site."
